scripts.build:fresh: turbo run build:clean && turbo run build
scripts.dev:front: export $(cat .env-dev | xargs) && pnpm start:dev:watch --filter=@pokt-foundation/node-nanny-api && pnpm start --filter=@pokt-foundation/node-nanny-ui
scripts.dev:back: export $(cat .env-dev | xargs) && pnpm start:dev --filter=@pokt-foundation/node-nanny-monitor && pnpm start:dev --filter=@pokt-foundation/node-nanny-event-consumer
scripts.dev:front:windows: (for /F "tokens=*" %i in (.env-dev) do set %i) && pnpm start:dev --filter=@pokt-foundation/node-nanny-api && pnpm start --filter=@pokt-foundation/node-nanny-ui
scripts.dev:back:windows: (for /F "tokens=*" %i in (.env-dev) do set %i) && pnpm start:dev --filter=@pokt-foundation/node-nanny-monitor && pnpm start:dev --filter=@pokt-foundation/node-nanny-event-consumer
scripts.docker:push:all: pnpm docker:build:all && docker push pocketfoundation/node-nanny:latest && docker push pocketfoundation/node-nanny-ui:latest
scripts.docker:monitor: docker exec -it nn_backend pm2 log monitor
scripts.docker:event: docker exec -it nn_backend pm2 log event
